resources.string:
In the year 2012,
nerds became bored
with violence
in video games.

The most hard core
of gamers looked for
something new.

Deep within the bowels
of a medical reserach
lab, a new violent
sport was born.

ANT
FIGHT
CLUB.

Congratulations!
You are now the
best ant scientist
around.

A game by Gamblore

Engine  AndroidPunk
Art         aseprite

Thanks for playing!

ANT
FIGHT
CLUB.
